ğŸš€ Discover the latest enhancements in Microsoft Flight Simulator.This week not to many new items. The number of developers jumping onto the MSFS 2024 train is increasing which means more things being added. This week tons of airports including Kirkwall Airport, Dusseldorf International Airport, Johannesburg International airport and much more. In the scenery enhancements only a small number of items are added including one for those who like to firefight. Join as we explore these breathtaking additions and see how they elevate your flight simulation experience. Do not miss out on the latest updates and improvements.
